description: Legacy department identifier from the FASTER fleet system to be corrected; serves as the source key for mapping to the standardized department code.
Standardized department code that replaces the legacy value; authoritative identifier for reporting, billing, and integrations.
Official department name aligned to the standardized code.
Program or division within the department linked to the standardized department code; used for organizational reporting and chargeback.
SQL update statement snippet used to set records to the standardized department code based on the legacy identifier; primarily for remediation scripts.
